title: My game has froze 2 games in a row now and I had to do a force shutdown.
body: I'm currently in my promos with a 1/1 record. During my first promo game, at around the twenty minute mark, my game completely froze along with my laptop (MSI GE62 APACHE) and I had to do a force shutdown. Unfortunately, I was unable to reconnect in time because the game already ended and it resulted in a loss. I queued up again and my game froze again at around the 20 minute mark and had to force shut down. I tried ctrl-alt-delete, but the frozen game screen took priority over any other tab I had opened. Luckily my team was able to win without me,but I wouldn't risk queueing again until I get this fixed. I think it has to do with my laptop but I'm not sure.

replies.body:
Does your laptop have a G-Sync display? This was an option for this model, so if your laptop has this, be sure to disable G-Sync through your Nvidia Control Panel, as this feature has been causing FPS issue and freezes for some players.

Let me know if this caused any change or if you *aren't* running a G-Sync display in your laptop.
